Instruction: Pat cod fillets dry with paper towels.
In a small bowl, combine softened butter, zested lemon peel, chopped dill, parsley, and minced garlic.
Season cod fillets with salt and pepper.
Place cod fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Spread the herb butter evenly over the top of each cod fillet.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the cooked cod before serving.
